ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: /*Email must have a subject and recipients to be sent*/If(Len(Trim(TextEmailSubject1.Text)) > 0 && !IsEmpty(MyPeople), DisplayMode.Edit, DisplayMode.Disabled)

/*Create semicolon separated list of people to email, send the email, reset subject & message fields*/           Set(_emailRecipientString, Concat(MyPeople, Mail & ";"));           Office365Outlook.SendEmail(_emailRecipientString, TextEmailSubject1.Text, TextEmailMessage1.Text, {Importance:"Normal"});           Reset(TextEmailSubject1);           Reset(TextEmailMessage1);           Clear(MyPeople)
